answers.answer: Hi there!Well, twitching could occur in a number of conditions such as epilepsy, twitching/ fasciculation associated syndromes, neuro-degenerative conditions, neurological infections/ inflammations etc. The prognosis would depend on the primary condition.For diabetes you could try searching for more information on our diabetes forums.Hope this is helpful.Take care!

question: I have been looking for some information regarding diabetes and twitching.... What was the outcome for your girlfriend. I have had the same experience with my partner. What information did you end up finding out?This discussion is related to/posts/Neurology/Twitching-and-possible-seizure-in-sleep/show/294380.
title: Type 1 diabetes and twitching
